Direct File Link Downloader - Simple & Fast File Downloads

A lightweight and user-friendly Chrome extension that helps you download files directly from URLs. Perfect for downloading documents, images, PDFs, and other files with just one click.

Key Features:
• Clean and intuitive interface
• Quick download from any direct file URL
• Support for multiple file types (.pdf, .jpg, .png, .doc, .json, etc.)
• Download history tracking (last 5 downloads)
• One-click redownload from history
• No ads, no tracking, completely free

How to Use:
1. Click the extension icon
2. Paste your file URL
3. Click "Download Now" or press Enter
4. Choose your save location
5. Access recent downloads from history

Perfect for:
• Students downloading study materials
• Professionals accessing documents
• Researchers saving papers
• Anyone who needs quick file downloads

Note: Works with direct file links. Some websites may restrict direct downloads for security reasons.

This extension is designed to be simple, fast, and efficient - doing one job and doing it well.

Version: 2.2
Developer: LOVECLM
Free to use
